009package imagingbook.common.ij.overlay;
010
011import ij.gui.Overlay;
012import ij.gui.Roi;
013
014public abstract class OverlayUtils {
015        
016        private OverlayUtils() {}
017
018        /**
019         * Returns a new overlay produced by joining two existing
020         * overlays, which remain unchanged. All involved ROIs are cloned.
021         * 
022         * @param olyA the first overlay
023         * @param olyB the second overlay
024         * @return the new overlay
025         */
026        public static Overlay join(Overlay olyA, Overlay olyB) {
027                Overlay oly = olyA.duplicate();
028                for (Roi roi : olyB) {
029                        oly.add((Roi)roi.clone());
030                }
031                return oly;
032        }
033
034}
